subtitle: A good family meal. Can be served hot or cold.

method.text: Put the bulgar wheat into a heatproof bowl. Pour over the boiling water. Cover the bowl with a plate and leave to stand for 10 min.
Stir in the sultanas, apricots, leeks, orange rind, parsley, thyme and egg white. Season with black pepper and set aside.
Wipe the bacon joint with a damp cloth. Using a long sharp knife cut through the meat in a spiral. Open out and spread with the stuffing, then roll back up into a neat shape with string.
Wrap the bacon joint in greased foil and put into a baking tin. Cook in the oven for 1 days.
Meanwhile, put all the ingredients for the glaze into a small saucepan and heat gently until sugar has dissolved. Then boil for 2 min until syrupy.
Open up the foil parcel and spoon the glaze over the meat. Return to the oven for 15 min. Serve hot or cold.

title: Spiral stuffed bacon loin
